page.title: 11CASTLE PARK SCHOOL
page.content: The school was built in 1972 and at the present time has 167 children between the ages 4 and 7 years.There are more girls than boys at the moment.Six classes have 20-33 pupils each.The staff is all female and the Headmistress is Mrs.Hall.The catchment area of the school is within a 1 mile radius.School hours are 8.55am-11.55 and 1.25pm-3.25pm. Each playtime is 15 mins. long.Dinnertime is an hour and a half long.School dinners cost 59p.each 75 children stay and 48 bring sandwiches.Subjects studied are Maths, P.E.,Science,Language development,R.E., Music,Environmental studies and Creative activities.The school has a video recorder,televisions,cassette recorders,radios and many musical instruments.35 children play the recorder.It is hoped that they will have a computer soon.
